---
title: "inline knitr expressions"
engine: knitr
keep-md: true
---

```{r}
x = 1
y = "foo"
z = '"foo"'
a = '"foo'
b = '*foo*'
c = "*foo*"
d = "'foo"
e = "1"
f = FALSE
g = TRUE
h = NULL
i = "*foo*"
class(i) <- c("character", "asis")
```

Here's inline output: 

- `{r} x`
- `{r} y`
- `{r} z`
- `{r} a`
- `{r} b`
- `{r} c`
- `{r} d`
- `{r} e`
- `{r} f`
- `{r} g`
- `{r} h`
- `{r} i`
